forget.title: Forget Password
forget.p: We are here to help you, So enter the email for reset password.
forget.resetPar: We are a platform that seeks to connect clinical patients with doctors in various medical specialties and pharmacies all over the Emirates.

reset.title: Reset Password
reset.p: We are here to  help you, So enter new password then confirm it.
reset.resetPar: We are a platform that seeks to connect clinical patients with doctors in various medical specialties and pharmacies all over the Emirates.
